name: wordpress
description: === Kredeum NFTs, The easiest way to sell your content to NFTs Marketplaces === Contributors: yoannr35, alexr35, alain Donate link:  https://www.kredeum.com/ Tags: nft, blockchain, ethereum, ipfs Requires at least: 5.0 Tested up to: 5.8 Stable tag: {{version.stable}} Requires PHP: 7.0 License: GPLv3 or later License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

scripts.clean: npm run clean-kredeum && rm -rf vendor node_modules
scripts.build-txt: npx hbs-cli -D config/config.json readme.txt_handlebars -o kredeum-nfts -e txt
scripts.build-php: npx hbs-cli -D config/config.json kredeum-nfts.php_handelbars -o kredeum-nfts -e php
scripts.build: npm run clean-kredeum && npm run build-txt && npm run build-php && npm run build-vendor
scripts.check: npm run fix && npm run format
